func_sig.description: Calculate the Euclidean distance between two points in 3D space.
func_sig.name: calculate_distance_3d

func_sig.description: Evaluate arithmetic or mathematical expressions provided as strings.
func_sig.name: evaluate_expression

func_sig.description: Solves for the third side of a right triangle using the Pythagorean Theorem when two side lengths are provided and can also check if a, b, and c form a Pythagorean triple.
func_sig.name: solve_pythagorean_theorem

a.description: The length of one side of the triangle.

b.description: The length of the other side of the triangle.

c.description: The length of the hypotenuse or the third side of the triangle. If provided, the function will verify whether a, b, and c form a Pythagorean triple.

func_sig.description: Calculate the volume and surface area of a right circular cone given the radius and height.
func_sig.name: calculate_volume_surface_cone

radius.description: Radius of the base of the cone.

func_sig.description: Calculate the Euclidean distance between two points in 2D space.
func_sig.name: calculate_distance_2d
